name: Heartbeast's 1-Bit Godot Course: 3) Space Shooter (Export 1)
description:
Part Three  of Heartbeast's 1-Bit Godot course found here: https://heartbeast-gamedev-school.teachable.com/p/1-bit-godot-course-by-heartbeast

Course includes 4 projects of increasing complexity with the first two teaching some very basic beginner concepts. While still relatively simple, it's the first fully realized game, and I may add more complexity and maybe some enemy animations to it in the future.

Controls:

  • Movement: Up and Down Keys
  • Shoot: Space Bar

Heartbeast's 1-Bit Course Projects

  1. Rocket Launch - Complete
  2. Piggy- Complete
  3. Space Shooter - In Progress: Custom Font + Changing Scenes Next
  4. Metrodvania - Pending

Github Repository: https://github.com/xvcrimsajadevx/Godot-Projects/tree/main/1-Bit%20Course%20-%20...

Further Development: I have some ideas for increasing difficultly, adding powerups, and simple enemy animations and the likes. Will see if they come to fruition after doing the final project of the course.

Bonus Heartbeast content here: Heartbeast's Action RPG Tutorial
